NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Start by choosing the type of agreement you want to make. Then, select which party you represent and let the app guide you as you answer its questions in a clear and audible voice. When you're done, pass your phone to the other party to do the same thing.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: When both of you have answered your questions 2Sign will show you the agreement with your audio answers. Review the agreement, and when you are ready record your verbal consent. Done!
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search the items list, e.g. "Donald Duck"
